channel.title: You do X and then Y happens
channel.description:
https://medium.dave-bailey.com/the-magic-formula-to-describe-a-product-in-one-sentence-175ce38619c7
A look at how these founders described their startup before the idea was popular.
Facebook: _you type someone’s name and find out a bunch of information about them._
Uber: _you push a button and in five minutes a Mercedes picks you up and takes you where you want to go._
So got me thinking, how would we describe The Sources, our online course that way? How would we describe unconferences?
